messages.subject: L&LConference CDs (was College)
messages.msgSnippet: For Christmas, I gave myself a present....the collection of CDs from the conference.  I haven t had a chance to go through all of them, but the ones I have
messages.messageBody:
For Christmas, I gave myself a present....the collection of CDs from the conference. I haven't had a chance to go through all of them, but the ones I have listened to are terrific and really have affirmed our family's decision to unschool. Kelly's talk had me laughing (Tristan even came downstairs and asked where the party was since there was so much laughing...from both me and on the CD), while Ren and Sandra's discussion had me nearly in tears.

For anyone looking for a bit of a confidence builder when it comes to unschooling, I highly recommend these CDs!

Ren wrote:
<<Wes Beach spoke at the Live and Learn conference about creative ways
of documentation for helping unschoolers get into college.>>

I didn't realize he talked about that at the conference! I need to pull out that CD today!! <vbg> Jody was just asking me about homeschooling kids and college.

Malinda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
